medium: Lithographs on hand-made paper in linen portfolio
title: Study for "He Laughed", from the Portfolio "Lilacs and Smoke"
marks: Signed, dated, numbered, chop mark, annotated in r LM: [W.P. NA 1990]
description: Full length portrait of a man in long pants, naked from the waist up; he stands facing the viewer with his hands on his hips; the words \"He laughed\" inscribed, UC
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
